document.full_text: people in china living with hiv and aids are routinely being denied medical treatment in mainstream hospitals due to fear and ignorance about the disease, according to a study released by the united nations' international labor organization (ilo).
document.title: china aids sufferers being denied medical care
lines_and_colors: people in china living with hiv and aids are routinely being denied medical treatment in mainstream hospitals due to fear and ignorance about the disease, according to a study released by the united nations' international labor organization (ilo).
